description:
Cory was a referral from another model. The two had been in the service together, and the model remembered talking with his buddy Cory about doing porn. Both models are straight, but the one model said they always showered together, and he swore that Cory would more than exceed the "large endowment" requirement for porn.
When I met Cory, I found him very charming, especially since he has a thick Texas accent. He told me he used to be over-weight, and since joining the service, he had gotten in much better shape. He promised me he would come back in six months and knock me out with some amazing abs.
title: Cory - Solo
